## Source: ossf-package-analysis (6d8ae72ce3501b8463193222bf9bebe2913ee52bf39fb10c8c9aa2f2049ebaa5)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'addthis-wordpress-plugin' @ 2.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
